item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/12/10/staying-at-90-days/#comment-4411">Jim Vanderveen</a>.
There is an interesting experiment, how short can you make a cert valid for and still be useful? Can you imagine having to update a cert every 24 hours?

item.title: By: Jim Vanderveen
item.dc:creator: Jim Vanderveen
item.description: The 90-day limit is their initial compromise. You're absolutely correct re automation, and as they make progress on that front they will be shortening certificate lifetimes even further.
